## ggplot extensions
[ggplot extensions gallery](http://www.ggplot2-exts.org/gallery/)
```{r, eval = F}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("dgrtwo/gganimate")
install.packages('ggthemes', dependencies = TRUE)
```
